Description of incident: Mount Pleasant School District has informed approximately 915 present and former staff members that their personal information may have been compromised between January 18th 2015 and January 21st 2015.                                                                                                                                                                                                           A spokesperson for Mount Pleasant School District stated “Forest Hills  District had a denial of service and discovered they had been hacked,”  she said. “The district’s technology director found a Tweet that  mentioned us. She looked us up on the Web and called us to let us know  on Tuesday.”                                                                                                     When the technology  director for Mount Pleasant clicked on the link, it directed him to a file that included names, addresses and Social Security numbers”  of MPISD staff.More Information: http://www.dailytribune.net/news/data-breach-hits-mpisd-employees/articl...
